Text: Commonwealth Club TalkDear Jeff I just wanted to let you know that I thought your talk last night was inspirational I have been working in the San Francisco office for years helping to permit sites for generating facilities During this time our team have had to endure more than our fair share of irrational and misinformed individuals One thing they didnt teach me at business school was how to educate people in a hostile and political environment while maintaining your dignity and humility Your example last night has certainly set a new personal standard for me to strive for Sincerely Victor Browner

The EnronOnline Games how to playjust came and seems a little light on content and details Also I was under the impression that there was meant to be points for World Records and Olympic Records can we use the word Olympic in the how to play section Before I respond please revue and provide feedbackthoughts Cheers Victor Forwarded by Victor BrownerHOUECT on PM Craig Johnson on AM To cc Subject how to play Victor Just missed your call I will follow up with you later today on prizing covering North America Attached below is a basic game overview on how to enter and play Let me know if you need more details Thanks Craig how to play overviewdoc how to play overviewdoc
Legible Countries Cc you confirm the status of Singapore for the EnronOnline Games participation Cheers Victor

Using prize winners names for promotion Cc Leslie Dave had mentioned that Mark had some reservations about using prize winners names Could you please confirm weather we can or can not legally use prize winner names for promotional purposes and your rational for not wanting to disclose the winners Cheers Victor

The EnronOnline Games Winners Verificationas discussed see attached a letter requesting verification details What would be the most appropriate form of correspondence from a legal perspective From us to themfrom them to us Should respondants also sign a release to use their names Cheers Victor

The EnronOnline Games Winners Verificationas discussed see attached a letter requesting verification details What would be the most appropriate form of correspondence from a legal perspective From us to themfrom them to us Should respondants also sign a release to use their names Cheers Victor

Survivor Vacation Down Undermay have heard about the new survivor series Down Under Well this is my version I am heading off to Australia equipped with nothing more than my faithful companion Alyssa and laptop for two weeks While Down Under I will be forced to endure family and friends partake in primitive ceremonies involving the copious consumption of local fire water Other torturous events include swimming in doubleoverhead barrelling waves with a fiber glass floating device arduous treks across endless deserted beaches and hunting the elusive white dimpled ball through kangaroo infested rolling greenery I leave tomorrow evening If all goes well I will be back on the th of Aprilwish me luck I will be checking phone messages and have access to my email Victor

Hanson Cc Guys please see the email from Hanson below Dave would like to talk about this tomorrow morning say am PST please let me know if you cant make it Jeff can you provide us with an update on items and Harlan and Chris obviously we will be focusing on Hansons request for compensation for delayed opportunity to participate in Direct Access I have also attached a time line of events surrounding this agreement and the DASR Cheers Victor Browner Original Message From Bouse Earl mailtoEarl ansonAmericacom Sent Monday November PM To Browner Victor Dave Parquet Email Cc Booth Bill Email Barkovich Dr Barbara Email Smith Stewart Carson Brad Wallmann James Subject DASR Contract Notification to CPUC Dear Victor and David Please review the CPUC attachments provided by CLECAs Dr Barbara Barkovich The CPUC is aggressively following up on Direct Access contracts and DASRs Please let us know where you are in responding to the CPUC Direct Access Verification process as it relates to Hanson Permanentes contract with Enron as follows Have you been contacted by the CPUC or PGE related to the Direct Access verification process What information have you provided to the CPUC and to any other requesting party We look forward to hearing from you ASAP on answers to these questions We would also appreciate copies of any correspondence that you have had with anyone on the DASR and Direct Access Contract The DASR process was handled very poorly by Enron in September and those errors delayed Hanson Permanentes opportunity to participate in Direct Access until November We are awaiting Enrons remedy to compensate Hanson for the added power cost incurred during October Please call me if you have any questions Sincerely Earl Hanson Permanente Cement Direct Dial Fax Earl ansonAmericacom Original Message From BRBarkovich mailto Sent Monday November AM To CLECA Members Subject I have a question joint proposalvDOC Attachment AvDOC For those of you who have gone DA did all of your ESPs send your names to the utilities by Oct Here is the utility filing on DA suspension implementation and that is an important date I want to be sure that we dont have any problems along those lines I am including copies of the utility filings for those of you who want to learn more about this and why the date is important We need to file comments on the utility filings by Nov Barbara
